about_the_game:
This product requires Fantasy Grounds Unity

Fantasy Grounds Scifi Interiors Map Pack

You may now create the interiors of of your spaceships and other scifi constructions with the Fantasy Grounds Scifi Interior Map Pack. This package features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough and have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the new image tools.
This pack includes the following items:
  • Maps of premade Scifi interiors
  • Brushes of hoses, pipes, walls, floors and other contruction elements
  • Decorations that include chairs, desks, electronics, machines, and more
  • Floors of many different styles and materials
  • Walls in different styles and materials, with angled and rounded shapes aswell
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Joshua Watmough

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset. Requires Fantasy Grounds Unity
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded and if you are running Fantasy Grounds or Fantasy Grounds Unity.
detailed_description:
This product requires Fantasy Grounds Unity

Fantasy Grounds Scifi Interiors Map Pack

You may now create the interiors of of your spaceships and other scifi constructions with the Fantasy Grounds Scifi Interior Map Pack. This package features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough and have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the new image tools.
This pack includes the following items:
  • Maps of premade Scifi interiors
  • Brushes of hoses, pipes, walls, floors and other contruction elements
  • Decorations that include chairs, desks, electronics, machines, and more
  • Floors of many different styles and materials
  • Walls in different styles and materials, with angled and rounded shapes aswell
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Joshua Watmough

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset. Requires Fantasy Grounds Unity
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded and if you are running Fantasy Grounds or Fantasy Grounds Unity.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
